mainText:
In memory of Steve Jobs:

I grew to love Apple through my love for my son.  Fred Jr. taught that 
apple was the best computer, the best anything that America made. Fred Jr. has loved Mr. Apple (Steve Jobs) since he was fourteen and 
while I started later with computers it has become a Family of Apple. Steve Jobs will be remembered with love.
header: I grew to love Apple through the love on my son.
author: Fred
